title: varuttam aDuttiDAda
sahitya:
varuttam aDuttiDAda varattaik-koDuttiDAyO tiruttanIt-talattilE tigazhum vaDivazhagA nI


anupallavi

  karuttODu unnai enrum karudi varuginrEnE karuNaikkaDal ennum perumai kunrAdavanE


caraNam    viritta shaDaiyilE pirai taritta perumAnin vrak-kumAranE sUra samhAranE
parutta oru pAmbinai panjaNai pOlak-koNDu paDutta kOlak-kATSi koDuppEn maruganE
